law.catch_line: A person may sell soft-shell clams of the species Mya arenaria caught by hydraulic clam dredge only ...
law.text: A person may sell soft-shell clams of the species Mya arenaria caught by hydraulic clam dredge only to a person possessing a soft-shell clam dealer's and shipper's license. A person may sell soft-shell clams of the species genus Tagelus to persons other than a licensed dealer or shipper.
